interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/09/16
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stephen Chbosky'], 'Producers': ['David Hoberman', 'Todd Lieberman'], 'Starring': ['Julia Roberts', 'Jacob Tremblay', 'Owen Wilson'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']}
Review Text: My children had a very very good friend who had a disfigured face due to a car accident when he was 2 yrs old. He was so precious to all of us. He could play with our 3 year old, or hang out with our son who was his age though my son towered over him. My son was very protective of him. He passed away in his sleep just before Christmas when he was 12 years old. Our hearts were broken. When we saw the trailers for "Wonder," about six months after his death, we all KNEW that he HAD to see this movie together. We watched it in our home, and all of us cried. We all were amazed at the strength of this young boy, and were cheering his victories and crying during his sadness. We saw so much of our little friend in Auggie. It brought us closer to him. Our children already had had their learning experiences with their friend, but they all felt deeply for Auggie and as such, will never forget this story. It teaches so much about what is on the inside, and that those who are different from us...they can have the best stories!
Review Title: My children had a very very good friend who had a disfigured face due to a ...
Rating: 5.0

- **Content Tolerance:** While open to mature themes, the user prioritizes narratives that resonate emotionally with the whole family. They value unique retellings in established franchises that maintain depth, particularly stories that explore overcoming adversity.

- **Language and Accessibility:** The user enjoys English-language content with the use of subtitles that enhance their viewing experience, recognizing the value in audio descriptions and dialogue boost options.

- **Cast and Production Values:** They are particularly drawn to films featuring well-known actors and respected producers, valuing strong performances that elevate the storytelling experience.

- **Entertainment Value:** The user looks for thought-provoking entertainment that enriches family connections, finding joy in stories that emphasize emotional depth and foster memorable shared experiences.

Overall, the profile reveals the user’s commitment to discovering family-oriented films and shows that offer profound themes and meaningful interactions, creating lasting memories through thoughtful storytelling.
